TopicTitle: I CANNOT make gravity rings on console (Xbox)

Articles.Content:
First, when I attempt getting 16x symmetry with the symmetry glitch, every time it touches the rotor it changes back to 2x symmetry.

I tried it with 8x symmetry and when I tried to use the move tool to offset the parts that would make the gravity ring, they won't move out any further than touching the craft.

Help! Is it even possible to make gravity rings on console?
